metadata.shortInfo: Strain variant data from https://www.elegansvariation.org/. For more information see Cook DE, Zdraljevic S, Roberts JP, Andersen EC. CeNDR, the Caenorhabditis elegans natural diversity resource. Nucleic Acids Res. 2017 Jan 4;45(D1):D650-D657. doi: 10.1093/nar/gkw893. Epub 2016 Oct 3. PubMed PMID: 27701074; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC5210618. Colors follow the same scheme as ENSEMBL for predicted variants, and variants with no predicted impact are white and variants that don't have recognized predicted consequence are peachpuff (a pale pink-orange). Variants with more than one predicted consequences are colored by the first annotation.
